title: xLays

content: Newbie spamming different threads with the same post-reply.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3567592;sa=showPosts

comments.body: Quote from: xLays on July 22, 2023, 01:49:21 PMNewbie spamming different threads with the same post-reply.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3567592;sa=showPostsThere's a button to report post to moderators, if you report those posts to moderators after the delection there is a high chance that the account will be autoban.
